<?php
	/**
	 * Theme functions and definitions - VERSIONE MODULARE
	 *
	 * @package HelloElementorChild
	 */
	
	if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
		exit;
	}
	
	define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_VERSION', '2.0.0' );
	define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_PATH', get_stylesheet_directory() );
	define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC', HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_PATH . '/inc' );
	
	// Core functionality
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/core/cache-helpers.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/core/wpml-helpers.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/core/theme-setup.php';
	
	// Features
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/acf-featured-content.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/staff-management.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/noindex-management.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/service-categories.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/related-terms.php';
	
	// Shortcodes
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/shortcodes/staff-shortcodes.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/shortcodes/related-terms-shortcode.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/shortcodes/related-external-links-shortcode.php';
	
	// Admin
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/admin-notices-control.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/doctor-custom-order-panel.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/service-custom-order-panel.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/admin-columns.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/doctor-archive-query.php';
	require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/service-archive-query.php';
  require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/admin/service-keywords-updater.php';
	
	// CLI commands (solo se WP-CLI è disponibile)
	if ( defined( 'WP_CLI' ) && WP_CLI ) {
		require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/cli/cache-commands.php';
	}

{
  "name": "hello-villa-stuart",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Hello Elementor Villa Stuart Theme - Modular Version",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack --mode production",
    "dev": "webpack --mode development --watch",
    "lint:js": "eslint assets/js/src/**/*.js",
    "lint:css": "stylelint assets/css/src/**/*.css",
    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{js,json,css,scss,md}\""
  },
  "keywords": [
    "wordpress",
    "theme",
    "elementor"
  ],
  "author": "nwdesigns",
  "license": "GPL-2.0-or-later",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@wordpress/eslint-plugin": "^14.0.0",
    "eslint": "^8.0.0",
    "prettier": "^2.8.0",
    "stylelint": "^15.0.0",
    "stylelint-config-wordpress": "^17.0.0",
    "webpack": "^5.0.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^5.0.0"
  },
  "browserslist": [
    "defaults",
    "not IE 11"
  ],
  "prettier": {
    "tabWidth": 4,
    "useTabs": true,
    "singleQuote": true,
    "trailingComma": "es5",
    "bracketSpacing": true,
    "printWidth": 100
  }
}

file.content:
<?php
/**
 * Theme functions and definitions.
 *
 * For additional information on potential customization options,
 * read the developers' documentation:
 *
 * https://developers.elementor.com/docs/hello-elementor-theme/
 *
 * @package HelloElementorChild
 */

if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
	exit; // Exit if accessed directly.
}

define( 'HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_VERSION', '2.0.0' );

/**
 * Load child theme scripts & styles.
 *
 * @return void
 */
function hello_elementor_child_scripts_styles() {

	wp_enqueue_style(
		'hello-elementor-child-style',
		get_stylesheet_directory_uri() . '/style.css',
		[
			'hello-elementor-theme-style',
		],
		HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_VERSION
	);

}
add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', 'hello_elementor_child_scripts_styles', 20 );

<?php
/**
 * WP-CLI Cache Commands
 *
 * @package HelloElementorChild
 */

if ( ! defined( 'ABSPATH' ) ) {
	exit;
}

/**
 * Clear all caches
 */
class Hello_Elementor_Child_Cache_Commands extends WP_CLI_Command {

	/**
	 * Clear all caches (Elementor, WordPress, and plugins)
	 *
	 * ## EXAMPLES
	 *
	 *     wp theme cache clear
	 *
	 * @when after_wp_load
	 */
	public function clear( $args, $assoc_args ) {
		// Clear WordPress object cache
		if ( function_exists( 'wp_cache_flush' ) ) {
			wp_cache_flush();
			WP_CLI::success( 'WordPress object cache cleared.' );
		}

		// Clear Elementor cache
		if ( class_exists( '\Elementor\Plugin' ) ) {
			\Elementor\Plugin::$instance->files_manager->clear_cache();
			WP_CLI::success( 'Elementor cache cleared.' );
		}

		// Clear Breeze cache if active
		if ( function_exists( 'breeze_clear_all_cache' ) ) {
			breeze_clear_all_cache();
			WP_CLI::success( 'Breeze cache cleared.' );
		}

		WP_CLI::success( 'All caches cleared successfully.' );
	}
}

WP_CLI::add_command( 'theme cache', 'Hello_Elementor_Child_Cache_Commands' );

		<!-- Allow short ternary operator -->
		<exclude name="WordPress.PHP.DisallowShortTernary"/>

	<!-- Use WordPress-Docs ruleset for documentation standards -->
	<rule ref="WordPress-Docs"/>

	<!-- Check for PHP 7.4+ compatibility -->
	<config name="testVersion" value="7.4-"/>

	<rule ref="WordPress.WhiteSpace.ControlStructureSpacing">

input.content:
# Hello Elementor Procurato Child Theme

## Overview
This is a modular WordPress child theme based on Hello Elementor, reorganized following best practices for scalability and maintainability.

## Theme Structure

```
hello-theme-procurato/
├── assets/                    # Frontend assets
│   ├── css/
│   │   ├── src/              # Source CSS files
│   │   └── dist/             # Compiled/minified CSS
│   ├── js/
│   │   ├── src/              # Source JavaScript files
│   │   └── dist/             # Compiled/minified JS
│   ├── images/               # Theme images
│   └── fonts/                # Custom fonts
├── inc/                      # PHP includes (modular structure)
│   ├── core/                 # Core theme functionality
│   │   └── theme-setup.php   # Main theme setup and enqueuing
│   ├── features/             # Feature-specific modules
│   │   └── example-new-feature.php.example
│   ├── shortcodes/           # Custom shortcodes
│   ├── admin/                # Admin-specific functionality
│   └── cli/                  # WP-CLI commands
│       └── cache-commands.php
├── acf-json/                 # ACF field exports
├── languages/                # Translation files
├── partials/                 # Template partials
├── templates/                # Custom templates
├── functions.php             # Main functions file (loads modules)
├── style.css                 # Main stylesheet with theme info
├── composer.json             # PHP dependencies and scripts
├── package.json              # Node.js dependencies and build scripts
├── phpcs.xml                 # PHP Code Standards configuration
└── README.md                 # This file
```

## Key Features

### Modular Architecture
- **Core functionality** separated into `/inc/core/`
- **Features** organized in `/inc/features/`
- **Admin functionality** in `/inc/admin/`
- **CLI commands** in `/inc/cli/`

### Development Tools
- **Composer** for PHP dependencies and code standards
- **npm/webpack** for asset compilation
- **PHP CodeSniffer** with WordPress standards
- **ESLint & Stylelint** for JavaScript and CSS linting

### WP-CLI Integration
- Custom cache clearing commands
- Available when WP-CLI is present

## Development

### PHP Code Standards
```bash
# Install dependencies
composer install

# Check code standards
composer run phpcs

# Fix code standards automatically
composer run phpcs-fix

# Check PHP compatibility
composer run check-compatibility
```

### Frontend Assets
```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Build for production
npm run build

# Development with watching
npm run dev

# Lint JavaScript
npm run lint:js

# Lint CSS
npm run lint:css

# Format all files
npm run format
```

### Docker Commands (from project root)
```bash
# Access theme directory in container
docker exec -it procurato_php bash
cd /var/www/html/wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato

# Test PHP files
docker exec procurato_php php -l /var/www/html/wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato/functions.php

# Use WP-CLI
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar theme cache clear --allow-root
```

## Adding New Features

1. Create a new PHP file in `/inc/features/`
2. Use the example template in `/inc/features/example-new-feature.php.example`
3. Include the new feature in `functions.php`

Example:
```php
// In functions.php, add:
require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/my-new-feature.php';
```

## File Organization Guidelines

- **PHP files**: Use WordPress coding standards
- **JavaScript**: Use ES6+ features, compile for older browsers
- **CSS**: Use CSS custom properties, mobile-first approach
- **Images**: Optimize for web, use appropriate formats
- **Templates**: Follow WordPress template hierarchy

## Version
Current version: 2.0.0

## Author
Lushano Perera - nwdesigns

## License
GPL-2.0-or-later

3. Include the new feature in `functions.php`

Example:
```php
// In functions.php, add:
require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/my-new-feature.php';
```

## File Organization Guidelines

- **PHP files**: Use WordPress coding standards
- **JavaScript**: Use ES6+ features, compile for older browsers
- **CSS**: Use CSS custom properties, mobile-first approach
- **Images**: Optimize for web, use appropriate formats
- **Templates**: Follow WordPress template hierarchy

## Version
Current version: 2.0.0

## Author
Lushano Perera - nwdesigns

## License
GPL-2.0-or-later

# Procurato.co.uk - Project Documentation

## Project Overview
- **Type**: WordPress Corporate Website
- **Company**: Procurato (Procurement Company)
- **Page Builder**: Elementor Pro
- **Current Status**: Development environment setup complete

## Development Environments

### 1. Production Environment
- **URL**: https://www.procurato.co.uk
- **Stack**: LAMP (PHP 8.3, MariaDB 10.11, Redis, NGINX)

### 2. Staging Environment (Primary Reference)
- **URL**: https://procurato.nwdesigns.it
- **SSH Host**: 64.227.37.56
- **SSH User**: proc_dev
- **SSH Password**: `;s5"2BCSpVg2~_~`
- **Path**: /home/1466445.cloudwaysapps.com/hrkbcduhqp/public_html
- **Database Name**: hrkbcduhqp
- **Database User**: hrkbcduhqp
- **Database Password**: sBC3T2z98w

### 3. Local Environment
- **URL**: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local
- **Path**: ~/Sites/procurato.co.uk
- **Stack**: Docker containers (PHP 8.3, MariaDB 10.11, Redis, NGINX)

## Docker Configuration

### Container Access Ports
- **Website**: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local (port 80)
- **phpMyAdmin**: http://localhost:8082
- **Mailhog**: http://localhost:8026
- **MariaDB**: localhost:3307
- **Redis**: localhost:6380

### Database Credentials (Local)
- **Database Name**: procurato
- **Database User**: procurato
- **Database Password**: procurato_pass_2025
- **Root Password**: procurato_root_2025
- **Host**: mariadb (from within containers)

### Docker Commands
```bash
# Start containers
docker-compose up -d

# Stop containers
docker-compose down

# View logs
docker-compose logs -f [service_name]

# Access PHP container
docker exec -it procurato_php bash

# Access MariaDB
docker exec -it procurato_mariadb mysql -u root -p'procurato_root_2025'

# Rebuild containers
docker-compose build --no-cache
```

## WordPress Configuration

### Admin Access
- **Admin URL**: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local/wp-admin
- **Credentials**: Check wp_users table in database

### Important Settings
- **Redis**: Currently disabled in wp-config.php (set WP_REDIS_DISABLED to false to enable)
- **Debug Mode**: Currently disabled (WP_DEBUG = false)
- **File Permissions**: FS_CHMOD_DIR = 0775, FS_CHMOD_FILE = 0664

### Installed Plugins
- Elementor Pro (Page Builder)
- Breeze (Caching)
- Advanced Custom Fields Pro
- Duplicate Post
- Akismet

### Active Theme
- Hello Elementor

## Git Repository

### Repository Status
- Initial commit created with all project files
- .gitignore configured for WordPress development
- Excludes: uploads, cache, logs, vendor directories, .idea, *.sql files

### Key Excluded Directories
- /wp-content/uploads/
- /wp-content/cache/
- /docker/nginx/logs/
- /docker/nginx/cache/
- Node modules and vendor directories

## Development Workflow

### Syncing from Staging
```bash
# Download files from staging
sshpass -p ';s5"2BCSpVg2~_~' rsync -avz --progress \
  proc_dev@64.227.37.56:/home/1466445.cloudwaysapps.com/hrkbcduhqp/public_html/ \
  ~/Sites/procurato.co.uk/ \
  --exclude='.git' --exclude='wp-content/cache' --exclude='*.log'

# Export database from staging
sshpass -p ';s5"2BCSpVg2~_~' ssh proc_dev@64.227.37.56 \
  "mysqldump -h localhost -u hrkbcduhqp -p'sBC3T2z98w' hrkbcduhqp" > database_staging.sql

# Import to local
docker exec -i procurato_mariadb mysql -u root -p'procurato_root_2025' procurato < database_staging.sql

# Update URLs in database
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar search-replace \
  'https://procurato.nwdesigns.it' 'http://www.procurato.co.uk.local' \
  --all-tables --precise --recurse-objects --allow-root
```

### WP-CLI Commands
```bash
# Access WP-CLI in container
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar [command] --allow-root

# Common commands
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar cache flush --allow-root
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar user list --allow-root
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar plugin list --allow-root
```

## Hosts File Configuration
Add to /etc/hosts (if not already present):
```
127.0.0.1 procurato.co.uk.local www.procurato.co.uk.local
```

## Troubleshooting

### Redis Connection Issues
1. Redis is currently disabled in wp-config.php
2. To enable: Set `define('WP_REDIS_DISABLED', false);`
3. Ensure compression and serializer settings are compatible

### Container Issues
```bash
# Check container status
docker ps -a | grep procurato

# View container logs
docker-compose logs [container_name]

# Restart all containers
docker-compose restart

# Full reset
docker-compose down
docker-compose up -d --build
```

### Permission Issues
```bash
# Fix file permissions
docker exec procurato_php chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/html
docker exec procurato_php chmod -R 755 /var/www/html
```

## Testing & Quality Assurance

### Linting & Type Checking Commands
```bash
# PHP linting (if configured)
docker exec procurato_php php -l wp-content/themes/hello-elementor/functions.php

# WordPress coding standards (if PHPCS installed)
docker exec procurato_php phpcs --standard=WordPress wp-content/themes/
```

## Project Structure
```
procurato.co.uk/
├── docker/
│   ├── nginx/
│   │   ├── Dockerfile
│   │   └── conf.d/
│   │       └── default.conf
│   ├── php/
│   │   ├── Dockerfile
│   │   └── conf.d/
│   │       └── custom.ini
│   └── mariadb/
│       └── init/
├── wp-content/
│   ├── themes/
│   │   └── hello-elementor/
│   ├── plugins/
│   │   ├── elementor/
│   │   ├── elementor-pro/
│   │   └── ...
│   └── uploads/
├── docker-compose.yml
├── wp-config.php
├── .gitignore
└── CLAUDE.md
```

## Important Notes
- Always use specialized all agents available in ~/.claude/agents based on task context when needed
- Always work in the local environment, never directly on staging/production
- Test all changes locally before deploying
- Keep this documentation updated with any configuration changes
- Database dumps are excluded from Git - store securely elsewhere
- The staging environment is the source of truth for content

## Last Updated
- Date: 2025-08-12
- Setup completed by: Claude
- All Docker containers running successfully
- Database migrated and URLs updated for local development
- Final configuration: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local (port 80)
- Repository cleaned of unnecessary setup files

## Theme Development

### Child Theme Structure (hello-theme-procurato)
The child theme follows a modular architecture inspired by the Villa Stuart theme:

#### Key Features:
- **Modular PHP architecture** with organized `/inc/` directory structure
- **Asset compilation** ready with webpack configuration
- **PHP Code Standards** with PHPCS and WordPress standards
- **WP-CLI integration** with custom cache commands
- **Development tools** configured (Composer, npm, linting)

#### Adding New Features:
1. Create PHP file in `/inc/features/`
2. Use template from `/inc/features/example-new-feature.php.example`
3. Include in `functions.php`: `require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/my-feature.php';`

#### Development Commands:
```bash
# Navigate to child theme
cd wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato

# PHP development
composer install
composer run phpcs
composer run phpcs-fix

# Frontend development
npm install
npm run dev          # Development with watch
npm run build        # Production build
npm run lint:js      # JavaScript linting
npm run lint:css     # CSS linting

# Test theme functionality
docker exec procurato_php php -l /var/www/html/wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato/functions.php
```

# Procurato.co.uk - Project Documentation

## Project Overview
- **Type**: WordPress Corporate Website
- **Company**: Procurato (Procurement Company)
- **Page Builder**: Elementor Pro
- **Current Status**: Development environment setup complete

## Development Environments

### 1. Production Environment
- **URL**: https://www.procurato.co.uk
- **Stack**: LAMP (PHP 8.3, MariaDB 10.11, Redis, NGINX)

### 2. Staging Environment (Primary Reference)
- **URL**: https://procurato.nwdesigns.it
- **SSH Host**: 64.227.37.56
- **SSH User**: proc_dev
- **SSH Password**: `;s5"2BCSpVg2~_~`
- **Path**: /home/1466445.cloudwaysapps.com/hrkbcduhqp/public_html
- **Database Name**: hrkbcduhqp
- **Database User**: hrkbcduhqp
- **Database Password**: sBC3T2z98w

### 3. Local Environment
- **URL**: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local
- **Path**: ~/Sites/procurato.co.uk
- **Stack**: Docker containers (PHP 8.3, MariaDB 10.11, Redis, NGINX)

## Docker Configuration

### Container Access Ports
- **Website**: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local (port 80)
- **phpMyAdmin**: http://localhost:8082
- **Mailhog**: http://localhost:8026
- **MariaDB**: localhost:3307
- **Redis**: localhost:6380

### Database Credentials (Local)
- **Database Name**: procurato
- **Database User**: procurato
- **Database Password**: procurato_pass_2025
- **Root Password**: procurato_root_2025
- **Host**: mariadb (from within containers)

### Docker Commands
```bash
# Start containers
docker-compose up -d

# Stop containers
docker-compose down

# View logs
docker-compose logs -f [service_name]

# Access PHP container
docker exec -it procurato_php bash

# Access MariaDB
docker exec -it procurato_mariadb mysql -u root -p'procurato_root_2025'

# Rebuild containers
docker-compose build --no-cache
```

## WordPress Configuration

### Admin Access
- **Admin URL**: http://www.procurato.co.uk.local/wp-admin
- **Credentials**: Check wp_users table in database

### Important Settings
- **Redis**: Currently disabled in wp-config.php (set WP_REDIS_DISABLED to false to enable)
- **Debug Mode**: Currently disabled (WP_DEBUG = false)
- **File Permissions**: FS_CHMOD_DIR = 0775, FS_CHMOD_FILE = 0664

### Installed Plugins
- Elementor Pro (Page Builder)
- Breeze (Caching)
- Advanced Custom Fields Pro
- Duplicate Post
- Akismet

### Active Theme
- Hello Elementor Child (hello-theme-procurato) - Modular Architecture

## Git Repository

### Repository Status
- Initial commit created with all project files
- .gitignore configured for WordPress development
- Excludes: uploads, cache, logs, vendor directories, .idea, *.sql files

### Key Excluded Directories
- /wp-content/uploads/
- /wp-content/cache/
- /docker/nginx/logs/
- /docker/nginx/cache/
- Node modules and vendor directories

## Development Workflow

### Syncing from Staging
```bash
# Download files from staging
sshpass -p ';s5"2BCSpVg2~_~' rsync -avz --progress \
  proc_dev@64.227.37.56:/home/1466445.cloudwaysapps.com/hrkbcduhqp/public_html/ \
  ~/Sites/procurato.co.uk/ \
  --exclude='.git' --exclude='wp-content/cache' --exclude='*.log'

# Export database from staging
sshpass -p ';s5"2BCSpVg2~_~' ssh proc_dev@64.227.37.56 \
  "mysqldump -h localhost -u hrkbcduhqp -p'sBC3T2z98w' hrkbcduhqp" > database_staging.sql

# Import to local
docker exec -i procurato_mariadb mysql -u root -p'procurato_root_2025' procurato < database_staging.sql

# Update URLs in database
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar search-replace \
  'https://procurato.nwdesigns.it' 'http://www.procurato.co.uk.local' \
  --all-tables --precise --recurse-objects --allow-root
```

### WP-CLI Commands
```bash
# Access WP-CLI in container
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar [command] --allow-root

# Common commands
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar cache flush --allow-root
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar user list --allow-root
docker exec procurato_php php wp-cli.phar plugin list --allow-root
```

## Hosts File Configuration
Add to /etc/hosts (if not already present):
```
127.0.0.1 procurato.co.uk.local www.procurato.co.uk.local
```

## Troubleshooting

### Redis Connection Issues
1. Redis is currently disabled in wp-config.php
2. To enable: Set `define('WP_REDIS_DISABLED', false);`
3. Ensure compression and serializer settings are compatible

### Container Issues
```bash
# Check container status
docker ps -a | grep procurato

# View container logs
docker-compose logs [container_name]

# Restart all containers
docker-compose restart

# Full reset
docker-compose down
docker-compose up -d --build
```

### Permission Issues
```bash
# Fix file permissions
docker exec procurato_php chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/html
docker exec procurato_php chmod -R 755 /var/www/html
```

## Testing & Quality Assurance

### Linting & Type Checking Commands
```bash
# PHP linting for child theme
docker exec procurato_php php -l /var/www/html/wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato/functions.php

# WordPress coding standards (child theme has PHPCS configured)
cd wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato
composer run phpcs

# Fix code standards automatically
composer run phpcs-fix

# Check PHP compatibility
composer run check-compatibility

# Frontend linting and building
npm run lint:js
npm run lint:css
npm run build
```

## Project Structure
```
procurato.co.uk/
├── docker/
│   ├── nginx/
│   │   ├── Dockerfile
│   │   └── conf.d/
│   │       └── default.conf
│   ├── php/
│   │   ├── Dockerfile
│   │   └── conf.d/
│   │       └── custom.ini
│   └── mariadb/
│       └── init/
├── wp-content/
│   ├── themes/
│   │   ├── hello-elementor/
│   │   └── hello-theme-procurato/        # Modular child theme
│   │       ├── inc/                      # PHP modules
│   │       │   ├── core/                 # Core functionality
│   │       │   ├── features/             # Feature modules
│   │       │   ├── admin/                # Admin functionality
│   │       │   ├── cli/                  # WP-CLI commands
│   │       │   └── shortcodes/           # Custom shortcodes
│   │       ├── assets/                   # Frontend assets
│   │       │   ├── css/src/              # Source CSS
│   │       │   ├── js/src/               # Source JS
│   │       │   └── {images,fonts}/       # Media assets
│   │       ├── acf-json/                 # ACF exports
│   │       ├── composer.json             # PHP dependencies
│   │       ├── package.json              # Node dependencies
│   │       └── phpcs.xml                 # Code standards
│   ├── plugins/
│   │   ├── elementor/
│   │   ├── elementor-pro/
│   │   └── ...
│   └── uploads/
├── docker-compose.yml
├── wp-config.php
├── .gitignore
└── CLAUDE.md
```

## Important Notes
- Always use specialized all agents available in ~/.claude/agents based on task context when needed
- Always work in the local environment, never directly on staging/production
- Test all changes locally before deploying
- Keep this documentation updated with any configuration changes
- Database dumps are excluded from Git - store securely elsewhere
- The staging environment is the source of truth for content

+## Theme Development
+
+### Child Theme Structure (hello-theme-procurato)
+The child theme follows a modular architecture inspired by the Villa Stuart theme:
+
+#### Key Features:
+- **Modular PHP architecture** with organized `/inc/` directory structure
+- **Asset compilation** ready with webpack configuration
+- **PHP Code Standards** with PHPCS and WordPress standards
+- **WP-CLI integration** with custom cache commands
+- **Development tools** configured (Composer, npm, linting)
+
+#### Adding New Features:
+1. Create PHP file in `/inc/features/`
+2. Use template from `/inc/features/example-new-feature.php.example`
+3. Include in `functions.php`: `require_once HELLO_ELEMENTOR_CHILD_INC . '/features/my-feature.php';`
+
+#### Development Commands:
+```bash
+# Navigate to child theme
+cd wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato
+
+# PHP development
+composer install
+composer run phpcs
+composer run phpcs-fix
+
+# Frontend development
+npm install
+npm run dev          # Development with watch
+npm run build        # Production build
+npm run lint:js      # JavaScript linting
+npm run lint:css     # CSS linting
+
+# Test theme functionality
+docker exec procurato_php php -l /var/www/html/wp-content/themes/hello-theme-procurato/functions.php
+```
+
